languages.text: "А их время так скоротечно..." {n}Эхо его голоса еще долго стихает, точно рокот далекого грома.{/n}
"And their time is so fleeting..." {n}The echo of the entity's voice lingers for a while, like the sound of distant thunder.{/n}

languages.text: "Und ihre Zeit ist so flüchtig ..." {n}Wie das ferne Grollen eines Gewitters hallt das Echo der Wesenheit noch eine Weile nach.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And their time is so fleeting..." {n}The echo of the entity's voice lingers for a while, like the sound of distant thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und ihre Zeit ist so flüchtig ..." {n}Wie das ferne Grollen eines Gewitters hallt das Echo der Wesenheit noch eine Weile nach.{/n}

languages.text: "Fânilerin ömürleri pek kısadır..." {n}Varlığın sesinin yankısı, uzaktan gelen gök gürültüsü gibi bir süre devam ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And their time is so fleeting..." {n}The echo of the entity's voice lingers for a while, like the sound of distant thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fânilerin ömürleri pek kısadır..." {n}Varlığın sesinin yankısı, uzaktan gelen gök gürültüsü gibi bir süre devam ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Leurs existences sont si brèves... » {n}L'écho de la voix résonne encore un certain temps, comme un tonnerre lointain.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And their time is so fleeting..." {n}The echo of the entity's voice lingers for a while, like the sound of distant thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Leurs existences sont si brèves... » {n}L'écho de la voix résonne encore un certain temps, comme un tonnerre lointain.{/n}

languages.text: «Y su tiempo es tan fugaz...». {n}El eco de la voz de la entidad resuena durante breves instantes, como el rugido de un trueno en la lejanía.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And their time is so fleeting..." {n}The echo of the entity's voice lingers for a while, like the sound of distant thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y su tiempo es tan fugaz...». {n}El eco de la voz de la entidad resuena durante breves instantes, como el rugido de un trueno en la lejanía.{/n}

languages.text: “而他们的时光转瞬即逝……”{n}那个实体的声音回响片刻便消散不见，宛如远方的雷鸣。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And their time is so fleeting..." {n}The echo of the entity's voice lingers for a while, like the sound of distant thunder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “而他们的时光转瞬即逝……”{n}那个实体的声音回响片刻便消散不见，宛如远方的雷鸣。{/n}

languages.text: 「そして彼らの時間はとても儚い…」{n}声の残響がしばらく続き、遠くの雷鳴のように響いた。{/n}
